alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca; Western Skagit County; Western Strait of Juan De Fuca (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 3:55PM PST until December 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow continued. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Western Strait of Juan de Fuca lowlands, including Sekiu, Clallam Bay, and Joyce, Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca lowlands, including Port Angeles, Sequim, and Blyn, Lowlands of western Skagit County, including Cypress Island, Guemes Island, Anacortes, Mount Vernon, and La Conner and Admiralty Inlet Area, including Port Townsend, Whidbey Island, and Camano Island. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca; Western Skagit County; Western Strait of Juan De Fuca
